column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Yummy Yummy Yummy!  Clean establishment.  Attentive waitstaff.  Went here for breakfast with the family while visiting Chicago - even though it was the middle of the week - it was extremely crowded.  We sat outside and were seated immediately as most people wanted to sit inside at that time.  Food came out pretty fast
column3: omelettes and pancakes - lots of fruit and coffee as well.  Everything tasted really good.  A breakfast for 5 people will end up costing around $70 but we were full and didn't even have lunch that day!  Definitely recommend it for families - place is very kid-friendly.
